show.subtitle: Your Economic Survival?  They're Not Looking Out For You.  We are.
show.title: The Wake Up Call

header.title: Terrorists Here, Terrorists There, Terrorists Everywhere… (Not)

title: Terrorists Here, Terrorists There, Terrorists Everywhere… (Not)
content:
A brief introduction to the Federal Reserve. <!--more--> A passage from Paul Craig Roberts on the bogey terrorist fear-mongering scares of the government.
“The American population has sat there, being terrified by the government’s lies.
” Thomas DiLorenzo is heard being interviewed about his book, Lincoln Unmasked in which he questions Lincoln’s motives behind the Civil War.
The shortcomings of GDP as a gauge of the economy.
The State Department cannot account for $6 billion in paid bills.
The contracts (if they ever existed) are missing.
Revisiting the deindustrialization of America.
The grim truth of the steady decline of America.
